NASLOV: Pješačenje je najbolji način da dođete do posebnih dijelova našeg zavičaja
TEKST:
Najatraktivnija pješačka staza je Kudin Most i započinje u selu Ravni Golubić odakle nas vodi grebenom Vratolom do ušća Krupe u Zrmanju uz predivne poglede na niz Krupinih slapova, podno Babinog Grada.
Staza dalje vodi uzvodno uz Krupu. Neposredno pred Kudinim mostom staza se diže na rub kanjona od kuda se pruža prekrasan pogled pojedine dionice kanjona Krupe što omogućava oko 150 metara visoka stijena koja se okomito diže iz rijeke. Kudin most je jedino mjesto gdje se može prijeći na lijevu obalu Krupe. Taj stari most je povijesni spomenik nulte kategorije satkan od 13 lukova vješto složenih od tesane sedre.
U sklopu pješačke ture Kudin most, svakako predlažemo obilazak manastira Krupa koji se nalazi blizu izvora rijeke Krupe, a sagrađen je 1317. godine. U sklopu manastira za posjetitelje je otvoren i muzej s velikom zbirkom ikona, knjiga i drugih vrijednosti.
Sadržaj bulleti:
Rezervacija
Dolazak na Mićanove Dvore
Polazak prema startu (zajednički transfer)
Dolazak na start
Sigurnosni protokol i kretanje na stazu
Pauza na stazi
Povratak na start / cilj
Povratak na Mićanove Dvore

dodatna majica i kupaći kostim
dodatna majica i kupaći kostim
tenisice za šetnju
ručnik

mobitel
fotoaparat
sunčane naočale
krema protiv sunca
ENG NASLOV: Hiking is the best way to reach special parts of our homeland.
ENG TEKST:
The most attractive walking trail is Kudin Most, starting in the village of Ravni Golubić, leading us along the Vratolom ridge to the confluence of the Krupa and Zrmanja rivers, offering beautiful views of the Krupa waterfalls, beneath Babin Grad hill.
The trail continues upstream along the Krupa River. Just before Kudin Most, the trail ascends to the edge of the canyon, providing a magnificent view of a section of the Krupa canyon, with a 150-meter-high cliff rising vertically from the river. Kudin Most is the only place where one can cross to the left bank of the Krupa. This old bridge is a historical monument of the zero category, composed of 13 arches skillfully crafted from hewn travertine.
As part of the walking tour to Kudin Most, we definitely recommend visiting the Krupa Monastery, located near the source of the Krupa River, built in 1317. The monastery also houses a museum with a large collection of icons, books, and other valuables.
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
Reservation
Arrival at Mićanove Dvore
Departure to the start (group transfer)
Arrival at the start
Safety protocol and start on the trail
Pause on the trail
Return to the start/finish
Return to Mićanove Dvore
ENG Uzeti sa sobom - sadrzaj:
additional t-shirt and 
walking sneakers 
towel

TEKST:
Kajak izlet rijekom Zrmanjom savršen za obitelj i grupe, a Zrmanja je idealno mjesto da se rashladite tijekom vrućih dana u rijeci Zrmanji. 
Službena Kayak staza duga je 14 km od službenog starta u mjestu Kaštel Žegarki do službenog izlaza u mjestu Muškovci. Temperatura vode varira od 14 – 20 stupnjeva. Staza se sastoji od dva dijela. Prvi dio staze dug je 7 km i dobar je za početnike, na ovom djelu ćemo naučiti kako veslati. 
Na 7 km nalazi se veliki slap Veliki buk visok 11 metara na tom slapu izlazimo, zaobilazimo ga pješice, a vaše kajake spuštamo niz slap gdje ujedno počinje i drugi dio staze. 
Neposredno iznad Velikog buka, rijeka Krupa se ulijeva u rijeku Zrmanju. Drugi dio staze je brži i intenzivniji i tu ćemo skočiti s nekoliko slapova od 1m, 2m, 3m i 5m.  Na 14 km, u mjestu Muškovci, je službeni izlaz našeg centra gdje se možete presvući u suhu robu u našim svlačionicama. 
Na izlazu se možete odmoriti uz piće i kupati se. Nakon što se presvučete, naši autobusi Vas vraćaju po Vaše automobile nakon čega idete na Mićanove Dvore gdje Vas čeka ručak (potrebna prehodna najava).
AKTIVNOST:: Veslanje u kajaku za dvije osobe
Sadržaj bulleti:
Rezervacija
Dolazak na Start Kaštel Žegarski
Oblačenje & Sigurnosni protokol
Organizacija spusta
Pauza za piknik ručak
Dolazak na cilj
OBAVEZNO:
dodatna majica
tenisice za ulazak u vodu
ručnik
PO ŽELJI:
mobitel
fotoaparat
sunčane naočale
krema protiv sunca
*svaki kajak/raft ima nepropusnu bačvu za stvari
ENG TEKST:
Kayaking excursion on the Zrmanja River is perfect for families and groups, and Zrmanja is the ideal place to cool off during hot days on the river.
The official Kayak trail is 14 km long, starting from the official starting point in the village of Kaštel Žegarki to the official exit in the village of Muškovci. The water temperature varies from 14 to 20 degrees Celsius. The trail consists of two parts. The first part of the trail is 7 km long and is suitable for beginners; on this part, we will learn how to paddle.
At the 7 km mark, there is a large waterfall called Veliki Buk, 11 meters high. We will exit at this waterfall, bypass it on foot, and lower your kayaks down the waterfall, marking the beginning of the second part of the trail.
Immediately above Veliki Buk, the Krupa River flows into the Zrmanja River. The second part of the trail is faster and more intense, where we will jump over several waterfalls of 1m, 2m, 3m, and 5m. At the 14 km mark, in the village of Muškovci, is the official exit of our center where you can change into dry clothes in our changing rooms.
At the exit, you can rest with a drink and swim. After changing, our buses will take you back to your cars, after which you will head to Mićanove Dvore where lunch awaits you (prior notice required).
ENG DESTINACIJA:: Upper course of the Zrmanja River
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
Reservation
Arrival at Start Kaštel Žegarski
Dressing & Safety protocol
Descent organization
Picnic lunch break
Arrival at the finish
ENG OBAVEZNO: YOU CAN CARRY IF YOU WANT:
ENG Sadržaj ‘Obavezno’:
mobile phone
camera
sunglasses
sunscreen
*each kayak/raft has a waterproof barrel for belongings

ENG NASLOV: 2 hours of rowing down the Zrmanja River and enjoying nature and good company.

Rafting excursion on the Zrmanja River is perfect for families and groups, and Zrmanja is the ideal place to cool off during hot days on the river.
The official rafting trail is 14 km long, starting from the official starting point in the village of Kaštel Žegarki to the official exit in the village of Muškovci. The first part of the trail is 7 km long and is suitable for beginners; on this part, we will learn how to paddle.
At the 7 km mark, there is a large waterfall called Veliki Buk, 11 meters high. We will exit at this waterfall, bypass it on foot, and lower your kayaks down the waterfall, marking the beginning of the second part of the trail.
Immediately above Veliki Buk, the Krupa River flows into the Zrmanja River. The second part of the trail is faster and more intense, where we will jump over several waterfalls of 1m, 2m, 3m, and 5m. At the 14 km mark, in the village of Muškovci, is the official exit of our center where you can change into dry clothes in our changing rooms.
At the exit, you can rest with a drink and swim. After changing, our buses will take you back to your cars, after which you will head to Mićanove Dvore where lunch awaits you (prior notice required).

NASLOV AKTIVNOSTI HERO: Kayak po Zrmanji do Jadranskog mora
NADNASLOV: KAYAK PO ZRMANJI DO JADRANSKOG MORA
TEKST:
Rijeka Zrmanja u Hrvatskoj skriveni je dragulj za ljubitelje kajakaštva. Započet ćemo naš dnevni sastanak u Obrovcu i odlazak nizvodno. Donji dio je savršen za vožnju kajakom kroz ušće rijeke. Kristalno čisto more i zadivljujući krajolik čine nezaboravan doživljaj. Dok veslate niz rijeku, prolazit ćete uz visoke litice i kršan krajolik. Struje rijeke su blage, što početnicima olakšava navigaciju, ali još uvijek dovoljno izazovno za iskusne kajakaše.
Dok ‘uživate’ veslajući nizvodno, rijeka se širi i naći ćete se u ušću rijeke Zrmanje sa Novigradskim morem.
Uz vožnju kajakom niz rijeku Zrmanju doživjet ćete najbolje od prirodnih ljepota i kulture Hrvatske, što ga čini nezaobilaznim za svakog ljubitelja na otvorenom. Završite svoj put u malom mjestu gdje možete uživati na plaži i nakratko ručati ili popiti kavu prije nego što se vratite u Obrovac, gdje smo se upoznali ujutro.
AKTIVNOST:: Veslanje u kajaku za dvije osobe
Sadržaj bulleti:

10:15 – Početak izleta
12:00 – Pauza za kupanje i klopanje
12:30 – Nastavak izleta do Novigradskog mora
14:30 – Završavanje na plaži Meka Draga
15:00 – Povratak na start cca. 20 min

NADNASLOV ENG: Kayak on Zrmanja to the Adriatic Sea
ENG TEKST:
The Zrmanja River in Croatia is a hidden gem for kayaking enthusiasts. We will start our day trip in Obrovac and head downstream. The lower part is perfect for kayaking through the river's mouth. The crystal-clear water and stunning scenery make for an unforgettable experience. As you paddle down the river, you will pass by towering cliffs and rugged landscapes. The river currents are gentle, making navigation easier for beginners but still challenging enough for experienced kayakers.
As you 'enjoy' paddling downstream, the river widens, and you will find yourself at the mouth of the Zrmanja River with the Novigrad Sea.
Kayaking down the Zrmanja River offers you the best of Croatia's natural beauty and culture, making it a must-visit for outdoor enthusiasts. End your journey in a small village where you can relax on the beach and have a quick lunch or coffee before returning to Obrovac, where we met in the morning.
ENG DESTINACIJA:: Zrmanja Canyon to the Adriatic Sea
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
09:45 – Meeting at the start – Obrovac
10:00 – Guide briefing, safety instructions and trip description
10:15 – Start of the trip
12:00 – Break for swimming and snacks
12:30 – Continuation of the trip to Novigrad Sea
14:30 – Finish at the beach Meka Draga
15:00 – Return to the start approx. 20 min

NASLOV: Veslanje po mirnom djelu rijeke Zrmanje
TEKST: Ovaj zanimljiv i novi sport potekao je s Havaja. Stand Up Paddle 2013. godine postaje jedna od najpopularnijih aktivnosti na otvorenom a na rijeci Zrmanji prisutan je preko deset godina. Pridružite nam se u avanturi Zrmanjom i doživite gornji kanjon uz poseban užitak veslanja na dasci. Prethodno znanje nije nužno, za sve one koji će ovaj zanimljiv sport probati po prvi put, naši će instruktori pokazati i objasniti sve što morate znati kako bi se nesmetano mogli opustiti i zabaviti dok se bavite ovom aktivnosti i uživate u ljepotama rijeke Zrmanje.

ENG NASLOV: Rowing on the calm part of the Zrmanja River.
ENG TEKST: This exciting and new sport originated from Hawaii. Stand Up Paddle (SUP) became one of the most popular outdoor activities in 2013, and it has been present on the Zrmanja River for over ten years. Join us in the Zrmanja adventure and experience the upper canyon with the unique pleasure of paddleboarding. Previous knowledge is not necessary; for those trying this interesting sport for the first time, our instructors will show and explain everything you need to know to relax and have fun while engaging in this activity and enjoying the beauty of the Zrmanja River.

NASLOV: Vožnja brodom po mirnom djelu rijeke Zrmanje i kupanje na ušću
TEKST:
Obilazak Zrmanje brodom počinje u Obrovcu odakle rijeka nastavlja svoj put kroz kanjon sve do ušća na kojemu se ulijeva u Novigradsko more. Na tom putu gosti će imati priliku vidjeti mnoge prirodne i kulturne znamenitosti počevši sa gradskim grobljem koje se nalazi odmah ispod Obrovca, a sagrađeno je na ostatcima Benediktinskog samostana iz 13 stoljeća , te dalje nizvodno kapelicu sv. Nikole koju su u 18 stoljeću dali podignuti pripadnici talijanske trgovačke mornarice, a koja već nekoliko stoljeća svejdoči kako je rijeka Zrmanja važan plovni i trgovački put. 
Rijeka dalje nastavlja svoj put kroz sve dublji i sve širi kanjon sa sve oskudnijom vegetacijom, a kanjon preuzimaju naizgled okrutne strme litice. U tom ogromnom prostranstvu kamena i vode tek oštrim okom možete uočiti usamljenu liticu na kojoj se nalazi mala kamena građevina „Pržunac“ za koju povijesni nalazi govore da je bila zadnja tamnica hrvatske kraljice Jelene što potvrđuje i stratešku važnost rijeke Zrmanje i njenog kanjona u povijesnim okvirima ovog prostora. 
Na samom zalasku kanjona i ulasku ove kraške ljepotice u more ulazimo u zagrljaj impozantnim liticama gdje su se u nekoliko stotina metara smjestili bjeloglavi supovi i Odisejeva špilja kao i ostatci starih naselja koje ovdašnje stanovništvo naziva starim Šibenikom. I tako s ogromnom povijesnom ostavštinom i neponovljivom ljepotom tiho i diskretno u nekoliko stotina širokoj delti ulazi u Novigradsko more gdje se brod okreće i vraća nazad u Obrovac. 
Ova kružna vožnja brodom koja starta i završava u Obrovcu, traje cca 2 sata. Potrebno je oko sat vremena do ušća, te jednako toliko za povratak.
Sadržaj bulleti:
Rezervacija
Dolazak u agenciju Riva Rafting Centar
Vožnja brodom
Povratak u agenciju Riva Rafting Centar
PO ŽELJI:
mobitel
fotoaparat
sunčane naočale
krema protiv sunca
ENG NASLOV: Boat ride on the calm part of the Zrmanja River and swimming at the mouth.
ENG TEKST:
The boat tour of the Zrmanja River begins in Obrovac, where the river continues its journey through the canyon until it flows into the Novigrad Sea. Along this route, guests will have the opportunity to see many natural and cultural landmarks, starting with the city cemetery located just below Obrovac, built on the remains of the Benedictine monastery from the 13th century. Further downstream, there is the chapel of St. Nicholas, erected in the 18th century by members of the Italian merchant navy, which for centuries has borne witness to the importance of the Zrmanja River as a vital maritime and trade route.
The river continues its course through a deeper and wider canyon with increasingly sparse vegetation, its seemingly cruel steep cliffs dominating the landscape. In this vast expanse of rock and water, only a keen eye can spot the solitary cliff with the small stone building "Pržunac," historically believed to have been the last prison of the Croatian queen Jelena, underscoring the strategic significance of the Zrmanja River and its canyon in the historical context of this area.
At the very end of the canyon, as this karst beauty meets the sea, we enter the embrace of imposing cliffs, where the white-headed eagles and Odysseus's Cave are nestled, along with remnants of old settlements that locals refer to as "Old Šibenik." Thus, with its immense historical legacy and unparalleled beauty, the river quietly and discreetly enters the Novigrad Sea in a delta several hundred meters wide, where the boat turns around and returns to Obrovac.
This circular boat tour, starting and ending in Obrovac, lasts approximately 2 hours. It takes about an hour to reach the mouth of the river and another hour for the return journey.
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
Reservation
Arrival at Riva Rafting Center agency
Boat ride
Return to Riva Rafting Center agency
ENG OBAVEZNO: YOU CAN CARRY IF YOU WANT:

NADNASLOV: OD KANJONA DO VRHOVA VELEBITA JEEPOM
NASLOV: Vožnja u Off-Road vozilima - Posjeta sv. Roka, Tulovih gradi, Majstorske ceste, Zrmanje
TEKST:
Provezite se terenskim automobilima teškim i atraktivnim terenima u samom srcu Velebita te kanjonima rijeka na par atraktivnih staza. Osim vožnje, snimanja i zaustavljanja na povijesnim lokacijama nudimo i cijeli niz aktivnosti od alpinizma do piknika.
Off road izvodimo po teškim terenima Velebita, kanjonima rijeka Krnjeze, Krupe i Zrmanje te šireg prostora bukovačkih vrleti gdje posjedujemo nekoliko atraktivnih staza za vožnju terenskim automobilima.
Naša koncepcija izvedbe off road vrlo često se razlikuje od klasičnih off road izleta samom činjenicom da bit izleta ne koncentriramo isključivo na vožnji po teškim terenima, snimanju i zaustavljanju na povijesnim i geografskim lokacijama već u okviru vožnje organiziramo i dopunske aktivnosti kao što su: elementi alpinizma, streličarstvo, organizacija piknika i sl.
DESTINACIJA:: Velebit i Zrmanja: sv. Rok, Tulove grade, Majstorska cesta, Zrmanja
Sadržaj bulleti:

Odlazak na turu
Povratak s ture

mobitel
fotoaparat
sunčane naočale
krema protiv sunca
NADNASLOV ENG: From the Canyon to the Peaks of Velebit by Jeep
ENG NASLOV: Off-Road vehicle ride - Visit to St. Roko, Tulo's towns, Master's road, Zrmanja.
ENG TEKST:
Take a ride in heavy-duty off-road vehicles through the rugged and breathtaking terrain at the heart of Velebit and the canyons of rivers along a few exciting trails. In addition to driving, filming, and stopping at historical sites, we offer a variety of activities from mountaineering to picnicking.
Our off-road adventures take place on challenging terrains of Velebit, the canyons of Krnjeza, Krupe, and Zrmanje rivers, and the broader area of Bukovačka Vrleti, where we have several exciting trails for off-road driving.
Our concept of off-road excursions often differs from traditional off-road trips by not solely focusing on driving through difficult terrains, filming, and stopping at historical and geographical locations. Within the ride, we also organize additional activities such as elements of mountaineering, archery, picnic organization, and more.
ENG DESTINACIJA:: Velebit and Zrmanja: sv. Rok, Tulove grade, Majstorska road, Zrmanja

TEKST:
Jedinstvena avantura u Hrvatskoj. Špilja Modrič dužine 829 metara pruža poseban doživljaj podzemnog svijeta. Potpuno netaknuta priroda, bez betonskih staza, reflektora i masovnih grupa mi Vam pružamo mogučnost da na jedan dan budete špiljar (speleolog) i posjetite najljepšu špilju Mediterana.
Špilja Modič nalazi se u Rovanjskoj na samo 36 m nadmorske visine, deset minuta hoda od automobila. Unutra ćete provesti dva nezaboravna sata vašeg života. Nakon što Vas opremimo speleološkom opremom (kaciga sa karabitnom ili eletričnom rasvjetom i zaštitnim kombinezonom) ulazimo u fantastičan svijet prirodnih kreacija. Okružit će Vas svijet stalaktita, stalagmita, stupova, meduza, sipa, crvenih kraljica i svega onog što vaša mašta može pružiti.
Špilja je kompletno ukrašena špiljskim ukrasima; nakon nekoliko manjih ali kratkih prolaza ulazite u prostrane i visoke dvorane i na vrlo ugodnoj temperaturi (cijele godine 17 – 18 °C) uz pratnju iskusnih vodiča speleologa ćete upoznati fantastičan svijet hrvatskog podzemlja.
Potrebna oprema: Sportska obuća, lagana odjeća ( mi ćemo vas opskrbiti kacigama, rasvjetom i zaštitnim kombinezonima da se ne zaprljate).
Sadržaj bulleti:
Rezervacija
Dolazak na start (lokaciju ćemo Vam poslati putem SMSa ili Whatsup-a)
Oblačenje & Sigurnosni protokol
ENG TEKST:
A unique adventure in Croatia awaits you. The Modrič Cave, stretching 829 meters, offers a special experience of the underground world. With untouched nature, devoid of concrete paths, floodlights, and large crowds, we provide you with the opportunity to become a spelunker for a day and visit the most beautiful cave in the Mediterranean.
The Modrič Cave is located in Rovanjska, just 36 meters above sea level, a ten-minute walk from your car. Inside, you will spend two unforgettable hours of your life. After equipping you with speleological gear (helmet with carbide or electric lighting and protective coveralls), we enter the fantastic world of natural creations. You'll be surrounded by stalactites, stalagmites, columns, jellyfish, squids, red queens, and everything else your imagination can conjure.
The cave is adorned with cave decorations; after passing through several small but short passages, you'll enter spacious and high halls where the temperature is very pleasant (17 - 18 °C all year round). With the guidance of experienced spelunker guides, you'll explore the fantastic world of Croatian underground.
Required equipment: Sports shoes, lightweight clothing (we will provide you with helmets, lighting, and protective coveralls to keep you clean).
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
Reservation
Arrival at the start (location will be sent via SMS or WhatsApp)
Dressing & Safety protocol
ENG OBAVEZNO: YOU CAN CARRY IF YOU WANT:

TEKST:
Biciklistička staza koja vodi od grada Obrovca uz rub kanjona rijeke Zrmanje pa sve do vidikovca na Pariževačkoj Glavici s koje možete vidjeti neponovljive prizore koje je tisućama godina stvarala rijeka Zrmanja. Kroz sivi dalmatinski krš Zrmanja je napravila bajkovit kanjon dubok 200 metara u podnožju planine Velebit.
Po povratku s Pariževačke Glavice prema gradu Obrovcu nastavljamo svoj put uzvodno uz rijeku Zrmanju stazom Malog princa, uz Čudino blato te ostatke starog turskog mosta pa sve do Jankovića buka (slap visok 5 metara). Ovaj slap idealno je mjesto za napraviti pauzu za osvježenje i kupanje.
Dužina biciklističke staze je (kružno) 22 km
start: Bike centar Obrovac

*Lunch paket moguće naručiti kod organizatora
DESTINACIJA:: Pariževačka Glavica, Čudino Blato, Jankovića Buk

Sastanak u biciklističkom centru Obrovac
Odlazak na turu
Povratak s ture natrag u biciklistički centar

fotoaparat
sunčane naočale/sa sigurnosnom vrpcom oko vrata 
krema za sunčanje
ENG NASLOV: Cycling Tour of the Obrovac Area
ENG TEKST:
The cycling trail that leads from the town of Obrovac along the edge of the Zrmanja River canyon all the way to the viewpoint at Pariževačka Glavica offers unforgettable views shaped by the Zrmanja River over thousands of years.
Through the grey Dalmatian karst, the Zrmanja River has carved a fairytale-like canyon 200 meters deep at the foot of the Velebit mountain.
On the way back from Pariževačka Glavica towards the town of Obrovac, we continue our journey upstream along the Zrmanja River through the Mali Princ trail, past Čudino Blato and the remains of an old Turkish bridge, all the way to Jankovića Buk (a 5-meter-high waterfall). This waterfall is an ideal spot to take a break for refreshments and swimming.
The length of the cycling trail is (aprox) 22 km, starting at the Bike Center Obrovac.

*Lunch packages can be ordered from the organizer.
ENG DESTINACIJA:: Pariževačka Glavica, Čudino Blato, Jankovića Buk

Going on the tour
Returning from the tour back to Bike center

NADNASLOV: Otkrijte netaknutu ljepotu Murvice jahajući kroz zadarsko zaleđe
TEKST:
Uživajte u nezaboravnoj jahačkoj avanturi u prekrasnom krajoliku Murvice pored Zadra. Ova jedinstvena aktivnost pruža vam priliku da istražite netaknutu prirodu na konju, uronjeni u mir i tišinu okolnog pejzaža.
Krenite na putovanje kroz šumske staze, pitoreskne doline i uzbuđujuće brdovite terene dok istražujete ljepote ovog prekrasnog područja. Osjetite snagu i eleganciju konja dok se krećete kroz prirodne staze, uživajući u svakom koraku na ovom jedinstvenom putovanju.
Bilo da ste iskusni jahač ili tek početnik, naši stručni vodiči će vam pružiti potrebnu podršku i sigurnost tijekom cijelog putovanja. Upoznajte se s konjem koji će postati vaš partner u ovoj nevjerojatnoj avanturi i stvorite nezaboravne uspomene koje će trajati cijeli život.
Nakon što završite svoju jahačku avanturu, opustite se i uživajte u lokalnoj kuhinji i gostoprimstvu Murvice, osjećajući se obnovljeno i revitalizirano nakon cjelodnevnog povezivanja s prirodom i konjem.
Sadržaj bulleti:
Rezervacija
Odlazak u Konjički klub Zadar
Odlazak na turu
OBAVEZNO:
duge hlaće
zatvorene cipele
sportska obuća
NADNASLOV ENG: Discover the untouched beauty of Murvica while horseback riding through the hinterland of Zadar.
ENG NASLOV: A unique equestrian adventure in Murvica.
ENG TEKST:
Enjoy an unforgettable equestrian adventure in the beautiful landscape of Murvica near Zadar. This unique activity offers you the opportunity to explore untouched nature on horseback, immersed in the peace and quiet of the surrounding scenery.
Embark on a journey through forest trails, picturesque valleys, and thrilling hilly terrain as you explore the beauties of this magnificent area. Feel the strength and elegance of the horse as you ride through natural paths, enjoying every step of this unique journey.
Whether you are an experienced rider or a beginner, our professional guides will provide you with the necessary support and safety throughout the entire journey. Get to know the horse that will become your partner in this incredible adventure and create unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime.
After completing your equestrian adventure, relax and enjoy the local cuisine and hospitality of Murvica, feeling rejuvenated and revitalized after a day of connecting with nature and horses.
ENG Sadržaj bulleti:
Reservation
Departure to Equestrian Club Zadar
Departure on the tour
ENG Uzeti sa sobom - sadrzaj:
long pants
closed-toe shoes
sports shoes
